actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-716.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3263) to establish a Federal program to strengthen and improve the capability of State and local educational agencies and private nonprofit schools to identify gifted and talented children and youth and to provide those children and youth with appropriate educational opportunities, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3263 (gifted and talented children education program).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3263) to establish a Federal program to strengthen and improve the capability of State and local educational agencies and private nonprofit schools to identify gifted and talented children and youth and to provide those children and youth with appropriate educational opportunities, and for other purposes.
